languages.text: "Если здесь нам грозит опасность, логичнее вернуться на корабль и избавиться от этого судна с помощью макропушек".
"If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."
languages.original_text: "Если здесь нам грозит опасность, логичнее вернуться на корабль и избавиться от этого судна с помощью макропушек".

traits.locale_text: "If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."
"If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."
"If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."
"If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."

languages.text: “如果这里有危险的话，应当立刻返回飞船，使用宏炮摧毁这片邪恶之地。这才是合乎逻辑的做法。”
languages.original_text: "If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."

traits.locale_text: “如果这里有危险的话，应当立刻返回飞船，使用宏炮摧毁这片邪恶之地。这才是合乎逻辑的做法。”

languages.text: «Si hay peligro aquí, la solución lógica sería volver a la nave y usar los macrocañones para destruir esta nave».
languages.original_text: "If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."

traits.locale_text: «Si hay peligro aquí, la solución lógica sería volver a la nave y usar los macrocañones para destruir esta nave».

languages.text: 「ここが危険ならば、船へ戻ってマクロカノンでこの船を破壊するのが論理的な結論だ」
languages.original_text: "If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."

traits.locale_text: 「ここが危険ならば、船へ戻ってマクロカノンでこの船を破壊するのが論理的な結論だ」

languages.text: "Wenn uns hier Gefahr droht, wäre es logisch, auf das Schiff zurückzukehren und diese Station mit unseren Makrokanone zu zerstören."
languages.original_text: "If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn uns hier Gefahr droht, wäre es logisch, auf das Schiff zurückzukehren und diese Station mit unseren Makrokanone zu zerstören."

languages.text: « Si danger il y a, nous ferions sans doute mieux de retourner sur le vaisseau et de détruire ce bâtiment à coups de macro-canons. »
languages.original_text: "If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."

traits.locale_text: « Si danger il y a, nous ferions sans doute mieux de retourner sur le vaisseau et de détruire ce bâtiment à coups de macro-canons. »

languages.text: "Eğer burada gerçekten tehlike varsa mantıklı olan şey, gemiye geri dönüp makro topları kullanarak bu vasıtayı yok etmek."
languages.original_text: "If there is danger here, it would be logical to return to the ship and use the macro-cannons to destroy this vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Eğer burada gerçekten tehlike varsa mantıklı olan şey, gemiye geri dönüp makro topları kullanarak bu vasıtayı yok etmek."
